summary: This is an email chain from May 2020 involving attorney Stacey Richman forwarding a message from Mark L. Epstein, who in turn forwards a message from an individual identified as 'R O'. The forwarded message references a video of an entrance with a 15-minute cut recognized by police and asks if the recipient saw a police email, concluding with a reference to the document identifier EFTA00104753.

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: Attorney at Law Offices of Richman Hill & Associates PLLC who is forwarding an email chain. She includes a standard confidentiality notice in her email signature.

persons.name: Mark L. Epstein
persons.context: Individual forwarding an email from 'R O' to Stacey Richman. The subject suggests he is seeking or providing information.

persons.name: R O
persons.context: Author of the core message, sent from an email address 'eskadradl@gmail.com', discussing a video with a 15-minute cut and police recognition of it.

connections.description: Mark L. Epstein is sending an email to Stacey Richman, who then forwards it. The context suggests a professional or informational exchange.
Mark L. Epstein is forwarding an email originally sent to him by 'R O'.

events.title: Email from R O regarding video
events.description: An individual using the identifier 'R O' sends an email to Mark L. Epstein discussing a video of an entrance that has a 15-minute cut, which police have recognized, and asks if Epstein saw a related police email.

events.title: Epstein forwards email to Richman
events.description: Mark L. Epstein forwards the email from 'R O' to attorney Stacey Richman.

events.title: Richman forwards email chain
events.description: Attorney Stacey Richman forwards the email chain from Mark L. Epstein, adding a confidentiality notice.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from May 2020 involving attorney Stacey Richman and Mark L. Epstein.
The core message, from 'R O', references a video of an entrance with a 15-minute cut that police have recognized.
The message asks Mark L. Epstein if he saw a related police email.
The final line of the core message is 'Let me know if you see EFTA00104753', which is the identifier for this document file.
The correspondence includes a standard attorney-client confidentiality notice.
